root: ^"Ah, adventurer! You wouldn’t have stumbled upon any of these 'cards' have you? Marvelous little things. I am desperately trying to complete my collection."

c-0: ^"It is very simple really. You hand over one of your precious cards. I assess its actual value and reward you accordingly. It is something we in the business like to call a 'trade'."

Drakkan: ^"Oh my, such a disgusting weapon! Amazing! I will give you something worthy to replace such a mighty artifact, [[class]]!"
Asteran: ^"Oh my, such a divine weapon! Amazing! I will give you something worthy to replace such a mighty artifact, [[class]]!"
GoldenIdol: ^"This… this can’t be real. It… is… AMAZING! I want it. I need it! Please kind [[class]], take my most precious possession. It is yours, yours I say! It pales in comparison to this magnificent token of perfection!"
Legendary: ^"Marvelous! What a gem you’ve found! I can only repay this with this Elixir I found not too long ago. It is rumored to unlock some untapped potential deep within you. Take it, take it! Well earned my friend."
Corruption: ^"Ugh! Why - this thing is absolutely despicable. I should charge YOU gold for this!"
Common: ^"A rather plain-looking thing but it'll do. I suppose I have some gold and a potion to spare."
Uncommon: ^"A rather plain-looking thing but it'll do. I suppose I have some gold and a potion to spare."
Monster: ^"That is... most peculiar! Quite an interesting card, I'll gladly trade it for one of these, adventurer."
Rare: ^"Oh, how delightful! This wasn’t in my collection just yet. Here, I consider this to be fair trade and do come again!"
Epic: ^"Oh, how delightful! This wasn’t in my collection just yet. Here, I consider this to be fair trade and do come again!"
